room_title: Escape room "Shooters Saloon" by Code Breakers Escape and Puzzle Rooms in Saginaw
room_description:
The trail has run cold and Bill Tilghman a member of the Guardsman has deputized your group to help find where Bill Doolin is hiding out. Tilghman has been trailing Doolin for days and has ended up here at Shooters Saloon. An informant stated that he had seen Doolin here just yesterday drinking and playing cards. However, John Bosman the bartender states he never was.

You and your team need to find evidence that he was here and where he might be hiding out. You have one hour before the trail is lost for good.
